params._from: Address of the user to burn the token from.

params._bridge: Address of the bridge on this network.
params._remoteChainId: Chain ID where the remote token is deployed.
params._remoteToken: Address of the corresponding token on the other network.

params._to: Address of the user to mint the token for.

returns._0: True if the interface ID is supported, false otherwise.

userdoc.notice: This contract is the remote representation for some token that lives on another network,         typically an Optimism representation of an Ethereum-based token. Standard reference         implementation that can be extended or modified according to your needs.
